ValidationRule.description: You cannot close a ticket until SIP team owner is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (OR(ISPICKVAL(Ticket_Status__c,"Closed - Request Completed"), ISPICKVAL(Ticket_Status__c,"Closed - Not All Requests Complete"))) && BEGINS(Ticket_Owner__c , "Not Yet Assigned")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a SIP team owner
